com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.jupiter

Class Cassandra

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.EmbeddedCassandra
      • com.github.nosan.embedded.cassandra.jupiter.Cassandra
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.AfterAllCallback, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.BeforeAllCallback, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.Extension

    public class Cassandra
extends EmbeddedCassandra
implements org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.BeforeAllCallback, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.AfterAllCallback
    JUnit RegisterExtension for running an Embedded Cassandra. Cassandra will be started on the random ports. 
     public class CassandraTests {

        @RegisterExtension
        public static Cassandra cassandra = new Cassandra();


        @BeforeEach
        public void setUp() throws Exception {
                CqlScriptUtils.executeScripts(cassandra.getSession(), "init.cql");
        }

        @AfterEach
        public void tearDown() throws Exception {
                CqlScriptUtils.executeScripts(cassandra.getSession(), "drop.cql");
        }

        @Test
        public void test() {
                //test me
        }
 }
    Author:
    Dmytro Nosan
    See Also:
    RuntimeConfigBuilder, ExecutableConfigBuilder, EmbeddedCassandra, CqlScriptUtils
